name: youtubeplus
description: Professional-grade YouTube enhancement userscript with modular architecture, comprehensive error handling, performance monitoring, and automated testing
author: diorhc

scripts.build:analyze: npm run build && npm run benchmark
scripts.build:production: npm run clean && npm run build:minify && npm run validate:build
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test:unit && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.security:innerHTML: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const result = require('child_process').execSync('grep -r innerHTML src/ --include=*.js || true').toString(); fs.writeFileSync('innerHTML-usage.txt', result); console.log('innerHTML usage saved to innerHTML-usage.txt');"
scripts.security:full: npm run security:check && npm run security:innerHTML && npm run lint
scripts.prepush: npm run typecheck && npm run test:unit
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.validate:all: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run build && npm run validate:build && npm run validate:config
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:complexity && npm run analyze:optimization && npm run analyze:performance
scripts.analyze:all: npm run analyze && npm run analyze:build && npm run analyze:constants && npm run analyze:jsdoc
scripts.clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('coverage', {recursive: true, force: true}); require('fs').rmSync('youtube.user.js', {force: true}); require('fs').rmSync('youtube.user.js.map', {force: true}); require('fs').rmSync('bundle-size-report.json', {force: true}); require('fs').rmSync('eslint-report.json', {force: true});" && echo Cleaned build artifacts
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('node_modules', {recursive: true, force: true});" && echo Cleaned all artifacts including node_modules
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:ci && npm run build
scripts.quality: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run analyze:complexity
scripts.quality:full: npm run validate:all && npm run analyze:all && npm run security:check
scripts.prerelease: npm run quality:full && npm run build:production
